capstone-project/capstone-intro.description: Integrated project combining ROS 2, Isaac Sim, and VLA concepts.

demo-auth.title: Auth & Personalization Demo
demo-auth.description: This page demonstrates the adaptive content system. Use the Auth Debug panel (bottom-right) to toggle your login status and change your profile.

intro.title: Introduction to Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics
intro.description: Welcome to the comprehensive textbook on Physical AI and Humanoid Robotics.
